entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 55 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
